name: Super Frog Jump
description:
Super Frog Jump lets you take your frog up to places it's never been before! Collect coins to upgrade the skin of your frog. Watch out for the evil birds the higher you go. Shoot them down or jump on top of them to defeat them as you climb higher and higher. Don't let the moving platforms fool you or you'll find yourself back in the pond. Super Frog Jump is a game for all ages. Try to beat your high score and your friends high scores! Be careful because the game gets tougher the higher you go.

Pick from four different skins that your frog can wear! Unlock them by collecting coins in the game then purchasing them in the shop. Switch up the joystick controls to your liking whether you like it on the right or the left it is fully customizable.

Use the boost platforms to increase your score faster and jump on the birds for a faster jump. Survive as long as you can and get the highest score you possibly can.

Can you survive without falling off the platforms?
